TopicTitle: Sooo, has any body watched Rooster Teeths recent gaming podcast?

Articles.Content:
I had just started to listen to the latest gaming podcast made by Rooster Teeth Productions and I heard them mention a familiar game. In the first 10 minutes they mention kerbal space program. In short they go on to mention all they learned in there time in KSP. They mention that they go on to mention that they noticed the game through steams latest sale at which KSP dropped almost 50%. The podcast can be found on iTunes as The Patch, on Youtube here

, and on their site here http://roosterteeth.com/gamepodcast/episode.php?id=9
not a big mention but a mention none the less.
Still, imagine Gus and Gavin in a lets play with KSP. Comedy Gold

Still, imagine Gus and Gavin in a lets play with KSP. Comedy Gold

Or how about a Rage Quit video with KSP. Michael raging as his rockets go tumbling and exploding...
